Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to unlawful discriminatory practices relating to employers
Summary: Makes it unlawful for an employer to fail to take immediate and appropriate corrective action when he or she knows of a non-employee sexually harassing certain employees.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to unlawful discriminatory practices relating to employers
